document_data.mainbody:
Turnbetl was the largest and closest satellite of HCatha, the farthest planet from the Sun in Realmspace.
The spherical moon orbited HCatha along the plane of the flat disc in a very eccentric orbit, with a perigee distance of  and an apogee of .
The moons atmosphere was extremely unstable, composed of highly reactive gases that immediately exploded upon contact with oxygen. The typical atmosphere of a medium-sized spelljammer could produce an explosion several times stronger than a fireball cast by an experienced wizardâ€•enough to be decidedly lethal.
Due to the extremely dangerous nature of Turnbetl, it was recommended that the moon be kept in quarantine so travelers did not approach it.
